comment: @48:03 what would we do if the father is unknown?
I had allergies to cats and pollen. I got rid of them with lifting heavy weights and a good diet. I have two cats these days.

Its not uncommon to draw some amniotic fluid and run a genetics test on the baby very early in gestation.  I predict blood type could be identified at that stage... or they could just do a blood test immediately after delivery.  As long as mom gets the shot within a day or two there will be no further issues.
